nodes.text: Asa-Ku was a male Voss living on Voss during the Galactic War. A member of the Dream-walkers sub-sect of Voss Mystics, he was in the Mind Healer's grove around 3640 BBY , where he was approached by the Sith Lord Kallig, who looking for the information on the Forbidden Ritual. Asa-Ku agreed to share the secret on the condition that the Sith join the order of the dream-walkers.
Asa-Ku appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the Sith Inquisitor class mission on Voss.
